p: Astrocytes derived from human induced pluripotent stem cell (hiPSC) were used for this experiment. Human fetal brain tissue was procured following the informed consent of the mother. The brain tissues were processed according to approval by the Institutional Human Ethics and Stem Cell and Research Committee of National Brain Research Centre, India, in compliance with the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR). The telencephalon of human aborted fetuses (10â€“15 weeks old) was used to isolate fetal Neural Stem Cells (fNSCs). Isolation and differentiation of fNSCs to astrocytes were done as described by Fatima et al. [ 47] and Bhagat et al. [ 48].
